title: "Attempting to Reconnect"
body:
Legitimately, this single persistent error is grinding my gears to new levels. I just can't deal with it anymore. Not only have I been disconnected during every single game I've played since the release of the new patch BUT so have my pals.

Earlier today we ALL disconnected simultaneously even though we were miles apart. We lost in the 2 minutes we were gone even though we were ahead.

I just got banned because of a persistent issue such as this and there's nothing I can do about since Riot continues to claim that it's an issue on my end when it's not. My internet may be basic as basic can be but I can stream two HD movies at once without noticeable lag AND be on YouTube. Something needs to be done or at least lift my wrongful ban--like that will ever happen.

replies.body:
This bug is horrendous.

You NEVER reconnect, no matter how long you wait, but if you exit game and reconnect it does so instantly.

I can also Alt-Tab out and load anything from Twitch to YouTube to any application that used the internet and it connects fine.

It also reconnects at lightning speed, just like it does when there's NO INTERNET PROBLEMS WHATSOEVER.

I told riot and they said "its your fault"


Lol guess thousands of people experiencing the same issue at the same time randomly is our fault boys

Holy crap, other people are having this problem too?  I even submit a support ticket and everything.   They told me to turn off IPv6 and to connect to a public DNS.  I thought it was weird that I had only really started to have the problem recently.  It's nice to know that it's totally on their end.  I just wish they were more transparent about it.

I am having this issue as well and it is pretty severe. I can close and reconnect and everything is fine for as long as it takes to move out of base. Then everything stops working, skills don't show up, everyone stands in place, and then "attempting to reconnect" pops up. This is the only game I get any lag whatsoever in, and I live in Los Angeles.

Please this is not my internet as I checked on speedtest and I had a 20ms ping whereas on league it was around 160-200 spiking to 500 and then "Attempting to Reconnect". This bug disappeared last week but then the Harrowing Patch made it come back for some reason. Riot Please fix this problem.

This bug goes deeper than just forcing us to reload, its probably bugging out the system and determines that were D/C when we are infact still connected. Really odd.

Is anyone else experiencing a bug as the following?

At random in game for the last several days or so I will seemingly d/c and get the "Attempting to Reconnect". It never reconnects or if it does it would apparently take quite some time to do so (having waited 5+ minutes).

The problem is that it is not on my end. No one else in my match seems to d/c or at most one other person maybe (not premade). My ping is a stable 80 and doesn't spike and during the incident every time I can alt+tab and do a speed test, freely user the internet, browse the forums to see if there are any issues from others at the time or even talk in the Adobe Air client to friends.

Upon simply quiting the game and then "Reconnect" from the Adobe client I can get in freely without any abnormal wait (vs the never actually reconnecting in game issue). The issue may occur multiple times in a game with the exact same results and a quit->Reconnect fixes it instantly until the issue occurs again (sometimes 2-3x in a 30+ minute match). It is never able to reconnect on its own and my internet is always fine despite the connection issue in game nor do I experience any lag in game.

Has anyone else had this issue?

I've been having this problem also, I first noticed it around the release of 4.18.  Same thing, my ping in game and my internet connection will be fine, and then all of a sudden the game freezes up and I disconnect.  I get the "Attempting to Reconnect" message, but no matter how long I wait it never does.  However, like some here have said, if I manually leave the game and then reconnect it joins up no problem, until 10 minutes later when I disconnect again.  My internet isn't the issue; my Skype call never gets dropped and I can still access webpages online.  For so many people to have the same problem, it's sad that Riot would just dismiss the issue.
